price: Hell will be their resting place and above them will be coverings [of fire]. This is how We recompense the wrongdoers.
arabic: لَهُم مِّن جَهَنَّمَ مِهَادٞ وَمِن فَوۡقِهِمۡ غَوَاشٖۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ
